name: PollingRequestCode
desc: Codes that specify the type of the data to request when polling.

items.name: static var PollingRequestCodeNoRequest: NFCFeliCaPollingRequestCode
items.desc: A code that indicates no request.

items.name: static var PollingRequestCodeSystemCode: NFCFeliCaPollingRequestCode
items.desc: A code that indicates a system code request.

items.name: static var PollingRequestCodeCommunicationPerformance: NFCFeliCaPollingRequestCode
items.desc: A code that indicates a communication performance request.
